props.name: className
props.docblock: Specifies an additional `className` to add to the base element.

description.text: Specifies an additional `className` to add to the base element.

props.name: iconBefore
props.docblock:
An icon component to render before the content.
Example import of a Paragon icon component:

`import { Check } from '@edx/paragon/icons';`

description.text:
An icon component to render before the content.
Example import of a Paragon icon component:

`import { Check } from '@edx/paragon/icons';`

props.name: onIconBeforeClick
props.docblock: A click handler for the `Chip` icon before.

description.text: A click handler for the `Chip` icon before.

props.name: iconAfter
props.docblock:
An icon component to render before after the content.
Example import of a Paragon icon component:

`import { Check } from '@edx/paragon/icons';`

description.text:
An icon component to render before after the content.
Example import of a Paragon icon component:

`import { Check } from '@edx/paragon/icons';`

props.name: onIconAfterClick
props.docblock: A click handler for the `Chip` icon after.

description.text: A click handler for the `Chip` icon after.
